name: Careful Descent
description:
TEAM: Snake Rake
When an unlikely friendship between an alien and a human takes a turn. Careful descent is a fun little mobile game that revolves around 2 characters, trying to get back to earth.

Controls: Any button. 

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

- Background meshes. (all non cardboard art) 

- Victory sound / checkpoint sound effect.

Gameplay Footage.
